item.title: Test
item.description: Installing Hugo and creating our site First things first we need to install Hugo by referencing Hugo’s documentation Here. I’m on Linux using Debian so I’ll run the following command: sudo apt install hugo Once Hugo is installed we’ll run the following command to generate our new site: hugo new site dieg0sec -f yml We are passing in the optional “-f yml” to change the configuration file to a yml instead of the default toml.
